name: RGBeat
description:
(Currently In Development)

In This Rythem Action Game, Paint the world while you evade enemies, all to sync to the rhythm of the beat.

What Can You Paint?

Show us Below!

Controls:

Left Click on SpotDash \ Attack

Rules:

1.You can Only Move to the Rythem of the Beat.2.If you Click not on the beat, you will not move.3.The Amount you can move is entirely based on how large your circle is.4.Your Circle can grow if you don't move in a beat.5.Your Circle will Reset when you move.6.If you get hit by an enemy You Will Die.7.The Cello Enemy can give shields to different enemies, the shields will be destroyed if they are killed.

~ DiscoNeko Team~

Ilay Vardinon - Lead Game & Sound Design

Noam Argov - Lead Programmer
